turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a coffee that's a Peet's Coffee, the location in Los Angeles, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Frappuccino. Do they have those?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i don't see that on the menu at peet's.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about something that's caramel? Do you have anything that's a hot caramel drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me check for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they have a caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, so let me get three caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and you said you want that hot, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, correct, hot.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, 2%.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for all 3?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size did you want your drinks in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want all mediums.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, and which location in L A did you want to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need the one that's closest to Downtown LA.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me find a location near you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: are you near 300 world way?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I am.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll send you order to that location, one moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you 3 medium caramel macchiatos with 2% milk to be picked up at the pete's coffee at 300 world way.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, cool. That's perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drinks will be ready in 7 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
